Application.description: The name or the Id of the Application.
Application.markdownDescription:
The name or the Id of the Application.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: \w+|[a-z0-9]{12}  
Update requires: Replacement

AttributeGroup.description: The name or the Id of the AttributeGroup.
AttributeGroup.markdownDescription:
The name or the Id of the AttributeGroup.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: \w+|[a-z0-9]{12}  
Update requires: Replacement

ApplicationArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws[-a-z]*:servicecatalog:[a-z]{2}(-gov)?-[a-z]+-\d:\d{12}:/applications/[a-z0-9]+  
Update requires: No interruption

AttributeGroupArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:aws[-a-z]*:servicecatalog:[a-z]{2}(-gov)?-[a-z]+-\d:\d{12}:/attribute-groups/[a-z0-9]+  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
